name: Living Metal
description:
Play as a living metal that can't jump, can only roll, and control wacky machines to improve your abilities.
* Possess Metal - Enter metal to activate it and increase its mobility.
* Bonded Metals – Activated metals will stick to other metals that come into contact and activate it.
* Control Metals - Control the various metal constructs that are activated by toggling.



A variety of robots waiting to be controlled, 30+ unique levels that are hand-constructed.
Experience a bizarre feel of controls and a unique puzzle-solving pleasure.
